title: Anthony Descotte
text:
Anthony Kevin Descotte (born 3 August 2003) is a <a href="Belgium">Belgian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="R.%20Charleroi%20S.C.">Charleroi</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Belgian%20First%20Division%20A">Belgian First Division A</a> debut for <a href="R.%20Charleroi%20S.C.">Charleroi</a> on 17 April 2021 in a game against <a href="K.A.S.%20Eupen">Eupen</a>.
